Title: Batman vs. Two-Face
Writer: Michael Jelenic, James Tucker, William Dozier (based on the 1966 Batman series created by), Bob Kane (character created by: Batman), Bill Finger (character created by: Batman), Paul Dini (character created by: Harley Quinn), Bruce Timm (character created by: Harley Quinn)
Actors: Adam West, Burt Ward, William Shatner, Julie Newmar
Plot: Gotham City District Attorney Harvey Dent is mutilated in a laboratory accident. When the duplicitous Two-Face embarks on a crime spree, Batman and Robin must solve the mystery of his identity while facing off against several other foes.
